vote.title: A public hearing to receive comments to amend the City of Dallas Thoroughfare Plan to delete Chenault Street from Buckner Boulevard to City of Dallas City Limits and delete Unnamed NE1 from Chenault Street to Interstate Highway 30; and, at the close of the hearing, authorize an ordinance implementing the change - Financing:  No cost consideration to the City
